original_title: 2 de Noviembre Dia de los Difuntos
overview: November 2nd, marks the Day of the Dead; a ghastly date on which cursed spirits rise from the grave to torment the the living. Witness here three shocking tales of violent debauchery. First, discover how far ‘loving the dead’ can really go, then observe the sinful rites of the ouija board and finally shriek in fright at the bloodthirsty rage of a beautiful killer.
title: Tales from Beyond the Grave
